column2: Construct an ontology focused on the following: ethnicity. Provide it in valid Turtle/RDF format, excluding any extra text.
column3: @prefix rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> .@prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> .@prefix ex: <http://example.com/> .# Classesex:Ethnicity rdf:type rdfs:Class .ex:African rdf:type rdfs:Class ;           rdfs:subClassOf ex:Ethnicity .ex:European rdf:type rdfs:Class ;            rdfs:subClassOf ex:Ethnicity .ex:Asian rdf:type rdfs:Class ;          rdfs:subClassOf ex:Ethnicity .ex:American rdf:type rdfs:Class ;            rdfs:subClassOf ex:Ethnicity .# Propertiesex:hasEthnicity rdf:type rdf:Property ;                rdfs:domain ex:Person ;                rdfs:range ex:Ethnicity .ex:hasPopulation rdf:type rdf:Property ;                 rdfs:domain ex:Ethnicity ;                 rdfs:range rdf:literal .# Individualsex:JohnDoe rdf:type ex:Person ;           ex:hasEthnicity ex:European .ex:European rdf:type ex:Ethnicity ;            ex:hasPopulation "750 Million" .ex:Asian rdf:type ex:Ethnicity ;         ex:hasPopulation "4.5 Billion" .ex:African rdf:type ex:Ethnicity ;           ex:hasPopulation "1.3 Billion" .ex:American rdf:type ex:Ethnicity ;            ex:hasPopulation "580 Million" .
